verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: welcomed] [ARGM-DIR: home] [ARG1: three Americans freed from North Korea this week] , but the fate of other detainees remains uncertain ahead of his summit with Kim Jong Un .

President Donald Trump welcomed home [ARG1: three Americans] [V: freed] [ARG2: from North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: this week] , but the fate of other detainees remains uncertain ahead of his summit with Kim Jong Un .

President Donald Trump welcomed home three Americans freed from North Korea this week , but [ARG1: the fate of other detainees] [V: remains] [ARG3: uncertain] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of his summit with Kim Jong Un] .
